ComicInfo.Title: Old School Part II
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ash is back at the cabin that started it all. He is on a mission to sever the Deadites tie to his world and receive a boon from the Necronomicon to see Sheila one more time. He has just got finished re-killing Linda and he is attacked by the cabin itself.
Meanwhile Sugarbaby, Ash's assisstant, is out in the car getting worried. She desides to go in and help Ash, but once she gets near she becomes possessed. Ash trys to get her to come to her senses but is forced to lock her in a closet.
Ash then gets attacked by a mirror and a evil toliet. Just when he feels he has the upperhand a voice calls to him from the basement and beacons him to "Join Us"
